thread.title: If Countries Could Send Each Other Valentine’s Day Greetings … | Foreign Policy
thread.title_full: If Countries Could Send Each Other Valentine’s Day Greetings … | Foreign Policy

author: Robbie Gramer
title: If Countries Could Send Each Other Valentine’s Day Greetings … | Foreign Policy
text:
By Emily Tamkin Emily Tamkin is a staff writer at Foreign Policy. February 13, 2017 - 11:51 am @emilyctamkin 
Tuesday is Valentine’s Day. The holiday is not celebrated all around the world (and is in fact banned in some parts of it), but love between nations exists throughout the globe, even in these tense, trying times. 
Here, then, are some Valentine’s greetings that various countries probably won’t send each other, but could.
